warehouse.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this warehouse?

add_store_modal.title: Add Store
add_store_modal.error_occurred: An error occurred while adding the store

edit_store_modal.title: Edit Store
edit_store_modal.error_occurred: An error occurred while updating the store

delete_store_modal.title: Warning!!!
delete_store_modal.confirm_message: Are you sure you want to delete this store?
delete_store_modal.warning_message: Make sure your decision is correct because you will lose all the information stored in the store forever,
delete_store_modal.confirm_prompt: are you sure? If you are sure,
delete_store_modal.type_instruction: type the name of the store four times in the input
delete_store_modal.input_title: Type the name exactly 4 times separated by spaces
delete_store_modal.error_failed: Failed to delete the store. Try again.

edit_stock_piece_modal.title: Edit Stock Piece
edit_stock_piece_modal.name: Name
edit_stock_piece_modal.image_note: Please upload clear images with a white background, a front view, a side view, and a full view if possible.
edit_stock_piece_modal.invalid_image_type: Invalid image type. Only JPEG, PNG, GIF are allowed.
edit_stock_piece_modal.image_too_large: Image size is too large. Maximum size is 5MB.
edit_stock_piece_modal.invalid_image: The uploaded file is not a valid image or is corrupted.

delete_stock_piece_modal.title: Confirm Deletion of Stock Piece
delete_stock_piece_modal.confirm_message: Are you sure you want to delete the stock piece "{{pieceName}}"?
delete_stock_piece_modal.confirm_prompt: To confirm, type the name of the piece four times, separated by spaces.
delete_stock_piece_modal.placeholder: Type the name of the piece four times...
delete_stock_piece_modal.input_aria_label: Input field to confirm deletion by typing the name of the piece four times
delete_stock_piece_modal.validation_message: You must type the name of the piece four times to enable the delete button.
delete_stock_piece_modal.input_title: You must type the name of the piece four times to activate the delete button.
delete_stock_piece_modal.delete_error: An error occurred while deleting the stock piece
